trans-unit.source: Setting up a DSC web pull server
trans-unit.target: 設定 DSC Web 提取伺服器

trans-unit.source: powershell,DSC
trans-unit.target: PowerShell，DSC

trans-unit.source: Setting up a DSC web pull server
trans-unit.target: 設定 DSC Web 提取伺服器

trans-unit.source: Applies To: Windows PowerShell 5.0
trans-unit.target: 適用於：Windows PowerShell 5.0

trans-unit.source: A DSC web pull server is a web service in IIS that uses an OData interface to make DSC configuration files available to target nodes when those nodes ask for them.
trans-unit.target: DSC Web 提取伺服器是一種 Web 服務，在目標節點請求 DSC 設定檔時，可使用 OData 介面將 DSC 設定檔提供給這些目標節點。

trans-unit.source: Requirements for using a pull server:
trans-unit.target: 使用提取伺服器的需求：

trans-unit.source: A server running:
trans-unit.target: 伺服器需執行：

trans-unit.source: WMF/PowerShell 5.0 or greater
trans-unit.target: WMF/PowerShell 5.0 或更新版本

trans-unit.source: IIS server role
trans-unit.target: IIS 伺服器角色

trans-unit.source: DSC Service
trans-unit.target: DSC 服務

trans-unit.source: Ideally, some means of generating a certificate, to secure credentials passed to the Local Configuration Manager (LCM) on target nodes
trans-unit.target: 在理想情況下，某些用來保護憑證的憑證產生方式，可傳遞到在目標節點的本機設定管理員 (LCM)。

trans-unit.source: You can add the IIS server role and DSC Service with the Add Roles and Features wizard in Server Manager, or by using PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 [伺服器管理員] 中的 [新增角色及功能精靈]，或使用 PowerShell 新增 IIS 伺服器角色與 DSC 服務。

trans-unit.source: The sample scripts included in this topic will handle both of these steps for you as well.
trans-unit.target: 本主題中所包含的範例指令碼也將為您處理這兩個步驟。

trans-unit.source: Using the xWebService resource
trans-unit.target: 使用 xWebService 資源

trans-unit.source: The easiest way to set up a web pull server is to use the xWebService resource, included in the xPSDesiredStateConfiguration module.
trans-unit.target: 設定 Web 提取伺服器的最簡單方式，是使用包含在 xPSDesiredStateConfiguration 模組的 xWebService 資源。

trans-unit.source: The following steps explain how to use the resource in a configuration that sets up the web service.
trans-unit.target: 下列步驟說明如何使用設定 Web 服務之設定中的資源。

trans-unit.source: Call the [Install-Module](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dn807162.aspx) cmdlet to install the **xPSDesiredStateConfiguration** module.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 [Install-Module](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dn807162.aspx) Cmdlet 以安裝 **xPSDesiredStateConfiguration** 模組。

trans-unit.source: **Note**: **Install-Module** is included in the **PowerShellGet** module, which is included in PowerShell 5.0.
trans-unit.target: **注意**：**Install-Module** 已納入 **PowerShellGet** 模組，其隨附於 PowerShell 5.0。

trans-unit.source: You can download the **PowerShellGet** module for PowerShell 3.0 and 4.0 at [PackageManagement PowerShell Modules Preview](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=49186).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在 [PackageManagement PowerShell 模組預覽](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=49186)下載 PowerShell 3.0 和 4.0 的 **PowerShellGet** 模組。

trans-unit.source: Get an SSL certificate for the DSC Pull server from a trusted Certificate Authority, either within your orgnaization or a public authority.
trans-unit.target: 從您組織或公開授權單位內受信任的憑證授權單位，取得 DSC 提取伺服器的 SSL 憑證。

trans-unit.source: The certificate recieved from the authority is usually in the PFX format.
trans-unit.target: 從授權單位收到的憑證通常使用 PFX 格式。

trans-unit.source: Install the certificate on the node that will become the DSC Pull server in the default location which should be CERT:\LocalMachine\My.
trans-unit.target: 在即將成為預設位置 (應為 CERT:\LocalMachine\My) 中 DSC 提取伺服器的節點上安裝憑證。

trans-unit.source: Make a note of the certificate thumbprint.
trans-unit.target: 記下憑證指紋。

trans-unit.source: Select a GUID to be used as the Registration Key.
trans-unit.target: 選取要作為註冊金鑰使用的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: To generate one using PowerShell enter the following at the PS prompt and press enter: '``` [guid]::newGuid()```'.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用 PowerShell 產生一個 GUID，請在 PS 命令提示字元中輸入下列命令，然後按 Enter 鍵：'``` [guid]::newGuid()```'。

trans-unit.source: This key will be used by client nodes as a shared key to authenticate during registration.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端節點會使用此金鑰作為共用金鑰，以在註冊期間進行驗證。

trans-unit.source: For more information see [Registration Key](#RegKey) section below.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱下面的[註冊金鑰](#RegKey)一節。

trans-unit.source: In the PowerShell ISE, start (F5) the following configuration script (included in the Example folder of the **xPSDesiredStateConfiguration** module as Sample_xDscWebService.ps1).
trans-unit.target: 在 PowerShell ISE 中，啟動 (F5) 下列設定指令碼 (包含於 **xPSDesiredStateConfiguration** 模組的 Example 資料夾的 Sample_xDscWebService.ps1)。

trans-unit.source: This script sets up the pull server.
trans-unit.target: 此指令碼會設定提取伺服器。

trans-unit.source: Run the configuration, passing the thumbprint of the SSL certificate as the **certificateThumbPrint** parameter and a GUID registration key as the **RegistrationKey** parameter:
trans-unit.target: 執行設定，傳遞 SSL 憑證的指紋作為 **certificateThumbPrint** 參數，以及 GUID 註冊金鑰作為 **RegistrationKey** 參數：

trans-unit.source: Registration Key
trans-unit.target: 註冊金鑰

trans-unit.source: To allow client nodes to register with the server so that they can use configuration names instead of a configuration ID, a registration key which was created by the above configuration is saved in a file named `RegistrationKeys.txt` in `C:\Program Files\WindowsPowerShell\DscService`.
trans-unit.target: 若要讓用戶端向伺服器註冊，使其可以使用設定名稱，而非設定識別碼，上述設定所建立的註冊金鑰會儲存在 `C:\Program Files\WindowsPowerShell\DscService` 中名為 `RegistrationKeys.txt` 的檔案。

trans-unit.source: The registration key functions as a shared secret used during the initial registration by the client with the pull server.
trans-unit.target: 註冊金鑰會當作共用密碼，在用戶端向提取伺服器初始註冊期間使用。

trans-unit.source: The client will generate a self-signed certificate which is used to uniquely authenticate to the pull server once registration is successfully completed.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端會產生自我簽署的憑證，以在成功完成註冊之後，用來向提取伺服器進行唯一驗證。

trans-unit.source: The thumbprint of the this certificate is stored locally and associated with the URL of the pull server.
trans-unit.target: 此憑證的指紋會儲存在本機，並與提取伺服器的 URL 相關聯。

trans-unit.source: **Note**: Registration keys are not supported in PowerShell 4.0.
trans-unit.target: **注意**：PowerShell 4.0 中不支援註冊金鑰。

trans-unit.source: In order to configure the a node to authenticate with the pull server the registration key needs to be in the metaconfiguration for any target node that will be registering with this pull server.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定節點向提取伺服器進行驗證，要向此提取伺服器註冊之任何目標節點的中繼設定內都必須有此註冊金鑰。

trans-unit.source: Note that the **RegistrationKey** in the metaconfiguration below is removed after the target machine has successfully registered, and that the value '140a952b-b9d6-406b-b416-e0f759c9c0e4' must match the value stored in the RegistrationKeys.txt file on the pull server.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，成功註冊目標電腦之後，會移除下面中繼設定內的 **RegistrationKey**，而且值 '140a952b-b9d6-406b-b416-e0f759c9c0e4' 必須符合儲存在提取伺服器之 RegistrationKeys.txt 檔案中的值。

trans-unit.source: Always treat the registration key value securely, because knowing it allows any target machine to register with the pull server.
trans-unit.target: 請務必保護註冊金鑰值，因為知道此值可向提取伺服器註冊任何目標電腦。

trans-unit.source: **Note**: The **ReportServerWeb** section allows reporting data to be sent to the pull server.
trans-unit.target: **注意**：**ReportServerWeb** 區段允許將報告資料傳送至提取伺服器。

trans-unit.source: The lack of the **ConfigurationID** property in the metaconfiguration file implicitly means that pull server is supporting the V2 version of the pull server protocol so an initial registration is required.
trans-unit.target: 中繼設定檔內缺乏 **ConfigurationID** 屬性即隱含表示提取伺服器支援提取伺服器通訊協定 V2 版，因此需要初始註冊。

trans-unit.source: Conversely, the presence of a **ConfigurationID** means that the V1 version of the pull server protocol is used and there is no registration processing.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，出現 **ConfigurationID** 則表示會使用提取伺服器通訊協定 V1 版，而且不會處理註冊。

trans-unit.source: **Note**: In a PUSH scenario, a bug exists in the current relase that makes it necessary to define a ConfigurationID property in the metaconfiguration file for nodes that have never registered with a pull server.
trans-unit.target: **注意**︰在 PUSH 案例中，目前版本有 Bug，必須針對尚未向提取伺服器註冊的節點，於中繼設定檔內定義 ConfigurationID 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This will force the V1 Pull Server protocol and avoid registration failure messages.
trans-unit.target: 這會強制執行 V1 提取伺服器通訊協定，並避免出現註冊失敗訊息。

trans-unit.source: Placing configurations and resources
trans-unit.target: 放置設定和資源

trans-unit.source: After the pull server setup completes, the folders defined by the **ConfigurationPath** and **ModulePath** properties in the pull server configuration are where you will place modules and configurations that will be available for target nodes to pull.
trans-unit.target: 提取伺服器設定完成之後，提取伺服器設定中 **ConfigurationPath** 和 **ModulePath** 屬性所定義的資料夾會是您放置模組和設定，以供目標節點提取的位置。

trans-unit.source: These files need to be in a specific format in order for the pull server to correctly process them.
trans-unit.target: 這些檔案必須使用特定格式，提取伺服器才能正確地加以處理。

trans-unit.source: DSC resource module package format
trans-unit.target: DSC 資源模組封裝格式

trans-unit.source: Each resource module needs to be zipped and named according the the following pattern **{Module Name}_{Module Version}.zip**.
trans-unit.target: 每個資源模組都必須根據下列模式 **{模組名稱}_{模組版本}.zip** 進行壓縮及命名。

trans-unit.source: For example, a module named xWebAdminstration with a module version of 3.1.2.0 would be named 'xWebAdministration_3.2.1.0.zip'.
trans-unit.target: 例如，名為 xWebAdminstration 且模組版本為 3.1.2.0 的模組會命名為 'xWebAdministration_3.2.1.0.zip'。

trans-unit.source: Each version of a module must be contained in a single zip file.
trans-unit.target: 一個壓縮檔必須包含一個模組版本。

trans-unit.source: Since there is only a single version of a resource in each zip file the module format added in WMF 5.0 with support for multiple module versions in a single directory is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 因為每個壓縮檔中只會有一個資源版本，所以不支援在 WMF 5.0 中新增可支援單一目錄中有多個模組版本的模組格式。

trans-unit.source: This means that before packaging up DSC resource modules for use with pull server you will need to make a small change to the directory structure.
trans-unit.target: 這表示在封裝 DSC 資源模組以搭配提取伺服器使用之前，您必須對目錄結構進行小幅變更。

trans-unit.source: The default format of modules containing DSC resource in WMF 5.0 is '{Module Folder}\{Module Version}\DscResources\{DSC Resource Folder}\'.
trans-unit.target: 在 WMF 5.0 中包含 DSC 資源的模組預設格式為 '{模組資料夾}\{模組版本}\DscResources\{DSC 資源資料夾}\'。

trans-unit.source: Before packaging up for the pull server simply remove the **{Module version}** folder so the path becomes '{Module Folder}\DscResources\{DSC Resource Folder}\'.
trans-unit.target: 在為提取伺服器進行封裝前，只要移除 **{模組版本}** 資料夾，路徑就會變成 '{模組資料夾}\DscResources\{DSC 資源資料夾}\'。

trans-unit.source: With this change, zip the folder as described above and place these zip files in the **ModulePath** folder.
trans-unit.target: 完成這項變更之後，如上所述壓縮資料夾，並將這些壓縮檔放在 **ModulePath** 資料夾中。

trans-unit.source: Configuration MOF format
trans-unit.target: 設定 MOF 格式

trans-unit.source: A configuration MOF file needs to be paired with a checksum file so that an LCM on a target node can validate the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 設定 MOF 檔案需要與總和檢查碼檔案配對，以便目標節點上的 LCM 可驗證設定。

trans-unit.source: To create a checksum, call the [New-DSCCheckSum](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dn521622.aspx) cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立總和檢查碼，請呼叫 [New-DSCCheckSum](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dn521622.aspx) Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet takes a **Path** parameter that specifies the folder where the configuration MOF is located.
trans-unit.target: 此 Cmdlet 會使用 **Path** 參數，指定設定 MOF 所在的資料夾。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet creates a checksum file named `ConfigurationMOFName.mof.checksum`, where `ConfigurationMOFName` is the name of the configuration mof file.
trans-unit.target: 此 Cmdlet 會建立名為 `ConfigurationMOFName.mof.checksum` 的總和檢查碼檔案，其中 `ConfigurationMOFName` 是設定 MOF 檔案的名稱。

trans-unit.source: If there are more than one configuration MOF files in the specified folder, a checksum is created for each configuration in the folder.
trans-unit.target: 如果在指定的資料夾中有多個設定 MOF 檔案，就會在每個設定資料夾中各建立一個總和檢查碼。

trans-unit.source: Place the MOF files and their associated checksum files in the the **ConfigurationPath** folder.
trans-unit.target: 將 MOF 檔案及其相關聯的總和檢查碼檔案放在 **ConfigurationPath** 資料夾中。

trans-unit.source: **Note**: If you change the configuration MOF file in any way, you must also recreate the checksum file.
trans-unit.target: **注意**：如果您以任何方式變更設定 MOF 檔案，也必須重新建立總和檢查碼檔案。

trans-unit.source: Tooling
trans-unit.target: 工具

trans-unit.source: In order to make setting up, validating and managing the pull server easier, the following tools are included as examples in the latest version of the xPSDesiredStateConfiguration module:
trans-unit.target: 為了讓您更輕鬆地設定、驗證和管理提取伺服器，下列工具將納入作為最新版 xPSDesiredStateConfiguration 模組中的範例︰

trans-unit.source: A module that will help with packaging DSC resource modules and configuration files for use on the pull server.
trans-unit.target: 有助於封裝 DSC 資源模組和設定檔以供提取伺服器使用的模組。

trans-unit.source: [PublishModulesAndMofsToPullServer.psm1](https://github.com/PowerShell/xPSDesiredStateConfiguration/blob/dev/DSCPullServerSetup/PublishModulesAndMofsToPullServer.psm1).
trans-unit.target: [PublishModulesAndMofsToPullServer.psm1](https://github.com/PowerShell/xPSDesiredStateConfiguration/blob/dev/DSCPullServerSetup/PublishModulesAndMofsToPullServer.psm1)。

trans-unit.source: Examples below:
trans-unit.target: 範例如下：

trans-unit.source: A script that validates the Pull Server is configured correctly.
trans-unit.target: 驗證提取伺服器是否正確設定的指令碼。

trans-unit.source: [PullServerSetupTests.ps1](https://github.com/PowerShell/xPSDesiredStateConfiguration/blob/dev/Examples/PullServerDeploymentVerificationTest/PullServerSetupTests.ps1).
trans-unit.target: [PullServerSetupTests.ps1](https://github.com/PowerShell/xPSDesiredStateConfiguration/blob/dev/Examples/PullServerDeploymentVerificationTest/PullServerSetupTests.ps1)。

trans-unit.source: Pull client configuration
trans-unit.target: 提取用戶端設定

trans-unit.source: The following topics describe setting up pull clients in detail:
trans-unit.target: 下列主題將詳細描述如何設定提取用戶端：

trans-unit.source: Setting up a DSC pull client using a configuration ID
trans-unit.target: 使用設定識別碼設定 DSC 提取用戶端

trans-unit.source: Setting up a DSC pull client using configuration names
trans-unit.target: 使用設定名稱設定 DSC 提取用戶端

trans-unit.target: 部分設定
